nodes.bodyText: You should explain why do you want to skip that test. I think one or two sentences describing the memory issue that you observed is fine. You could also add a TODO and attach it to this JIRA ticket: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEAM-9761 which tracks problems with GBK and CoGBK for Python (the issue can be possibly related)
